top.title: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files
top.summary: "We have nothing to hide," the US president writes after previously resisting publishing the documents.

top.title: Bangladesh's ousted leader Sheikh Hasina sentenced to death
top.summary: The former prime minister was tried by a special tribunal after 1,400 died during a crackdown on unrest in 2024.

top.title: Ukraine to import US liquefied natural gas via Greece
top.summary: Vital supplies are due to start flowing into the war-ravaged country this winter via a Balkan pipeline.

top.title: How my on-air 'brain fog' moment sparked a big debate
top.summary: When the BBC's Zoe Kleinman spoke about going through perimenopause she got a huge response.

top.title: Formula 1 tech used to rev-up train wi-fi speeds in new pilot
top.summary: The 60 day pilot will use signals from mobile phone masts and satellites in space to create a more reliable connection.

top.title: Keyless car theft devices used by criminals sell for £20k online
top.summary: It is not illegal currently to own the gadgets but the government has promised to ban them.
